replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:

楼上的命令在命令方块中执行时会有问题。

1.12
execute @a ~ ~ ~ kill @s[y=-1.8,dy=-1000000]

1.13
execute as @a at @s run kill @s[y=-1.8,dy=-1000000]
